title: From The Strongest Job of Dragon Knight, To The Beginner Job Carrier, Somehow, The Heroes are Depending on Me - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Comedic Undertone   Demi-Humans   Demons   Dragon Riders   Dragons   Elves   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Guilds   Heroes   Lack of Common Sense   Lazy Protagonist   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Low-key Protagonist   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Monster Girls   Monster Tamer   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic
author: Amaui Shiroichi   あまうい白一
description: Axel Granz, the strongest dragon knight of them all has switched his job to become a beginner carrier. Relieved that he can finally take off his legendary dragon knight’s helmet and escape the responsibilities of an elite S-class worker, Axel eagerly starts his new, low-class job!>
